title: Read and Understand Code
description: Learn to read files and understand code using Claude Code. Ask questions about code, get explanations, and build your understanding of any codebase.

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Read and Understand Code

Your task: Understand the mystery function in `mystery.js`

## Objectives
1. Read the `mystery.js` file
2. Create a file explaining what the function does

objectives.description: Create a file named `explanation.md` explaining the mystery function

bonusObjectives.description: Mention the time complexity (O(n log n))

hints.text: Ask Claude Code to read the mystery.js file and explain what it does.
Look at the recursive pattern and how the array is being divided. What sorting algorithm uses a pivot?
This is the QuickSort algorithm. Ask Claude Code to create explanation.md describing it as a sorting function.

solution.approach: Ask Claude Code to read and explain the code, then create a documentation file.
solution.example: Read mystery.js and explain what the function does. Then create explanation.md with your findings.
alternativeApproaches: What does the mystery function in mystery.js do? Create a markdown file explaining it.
Analyze mystery.js and document the algorithm it implements

learningPoints: Claude Code can read and explain any code file
You can ask questions about code to understand it better
Claude Code can identify common algorithms and patterns
